meta.description: Maximize profit from producing and selling products A, B, and byproduct C with process time constraints.

params.name: time_required
params.description: Time required for each product in each process

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per unit of each product

params.name: byproduct_profit
params.description: Profit per unit of byproduct C sold

params.name: disposal_cost
params.description: Cost to dispose of one unit of byproduct C

params.name: max_byproduct_sale
params.description: Maximum units of byproduct C that can be sold

vars.name: x
vars.description: Units of each product to produce

vars.name: y
vars.description: Units of byproduct C to sell

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: profit['A'] * x['A'] + profit['B'] * x['B'] + byproduct_profit * y - disposal_cost * (2 * x['B'] - y)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from products A, B, and byproduct C

constraints.name: front_process_time
constraints.description: Total time for front process cannot exceed available time

constraints.name: back_process_time
constraints.description: Total time for back process cannot exceed available time

constraints.name: byproduct_sale_limit
constraints.description: Units of byproduct C sold cannot exceed maximum sale limit

constraints.name: byproduct_production
constraints.description: Units of byproduct C sold cannot exceed production from product B
